title: Playing It Safe
description: Playing It Safe looks at ways children can stay safe while having fun. Each chapter includes a list of important and practical rules for staying safe on wheels, in the water, and on the playground. The familiar topics and easy-to-read text are supported by captioned photographs.
highFrequencyWords: community, dangerous, downhill, helmet, scooter, wrists
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Long Vowels                : Recognize spellings for long /a/
awareness: Adverbs : Recognize, form, and use adverbs ending in -ly
phonics: Compound Words                : Identify and form compound words
